properties.areaDesc: Winkler; Reeves County Plains; Eddy County Plains; Ward; Davis Mountains Foothills; Eastern Culberson County; Pecos; Loving
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 4 at 2:34PM CST until February 5 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Midland/Odessa TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5
inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph.

* WHERE...In New Mexico, Eddy County Plains. In Texas, Loving,
Winkler, Ward, Pecos and Eastern Culberson Counties, and
Reeves County Plains and Davis Mountains Foothills.

* WHEN...From 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ this evening to 6 PM CST /5 PM
MST/ Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

In New Mexico, the latest road conditions can be obtained by
calling 800-432-4269. In Texas, the latest road conditions can be
obtained by calling 800-452-9292.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ THIS EVENING TO 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ WEDNESDAY
